title: What is the spiritual capital of India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some it's Kasi - Varanasi, some it's virndhavan, puri, Gaya, for some it's Tirupati, Somones it's thiru-annamalai, some it's Srirangam. But wherever u are stay devotional and offer urself for godsmanship.

I have seen lot of spiritual activity in Tamil nadu. I cannot speak for other states. There are lot of mystical happenings. But these are reported by media. Probably media is not active in this respect in other states.
